Download_to.description: Lead-in for directory name in advanced-add form.

default_location.description: Default value for directory name in advanced-add form.

Expandcollapse_directory.description: Tooltip for expand/collapse button in directory tree view.

The_hostname_username_or_password_are_no.description: Tooltip for a type of task load failure.

Updating_download_tasks.description: Tooltip for updating-in-progress text in popup header.

Error_updating_tasks.description: Text for popup header on load failure.

Updated_$time$.description: Text for popup header on load success.

updating_now.description: Aside for tooltip on popup header when an update is in progress.

Configure_your_hostname_username_and_pas.message: Configure your hostname, username and password in settings.
Configure_your_hostname_username_and_pas.description: Body text for popup when no tasks are shown because nothing is configured.

No_download_tasks.description: Body text for popup when no tasks are shown because there are none.

Download_tasks_exist_but_none_match_your.message: Download tasks exist, but none match your filters.
Download_tasks_exist_but_none_match_your.description: Body text for popup when no tasks are shown because they're all filtered out.

and_$count$_more_hidden_tasks.description: Trailing text after task list when some tasks are hidden by filters.

Remove_download.description: Tooltip for delete button on a task list item.

Resume.description: Tooltip for resume button on a task list item.

Start_seeding.description: Tooltip for start-seeding button on a task list item.

Pause.description: Tooltip for pause button on a task list item.

$status$_$current$_of_$total$_downloaded.description: Subtitle for currently-downloading task showing stats.

$status$_$total$_downloaded.description: Subtitle for completed, not-uploading task showing stats.
